price: ግመል ጫኞቹም (ምስርን) በተለዩ ጊዜ አባታቸው «እኔ የዩሱፍን ሽታ በእርግጥ አገኛለሁ፡፡ ባታቄሉኝ ኖሮ (ታምኑኝ ነበር)» አለ፡፡
arabic: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِنِّي لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walammā faṣalati al-ʿīru qāla abūhum innī la-ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lawlā an tufannidūni
translations: you think me weakened in mind
